summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKenra Platinum Silkening Gloss is a lightweight shine enhancing formula for silky, lustrous hair and skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsTames frizz & smooths flyawaysProtects against humidityItem 2097599How To UseSmooth over damp or dry hair and skin. Apply heat for optimum shine and condition.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Hydrolyzed Silk, Parfum/Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Smooth over damp or dry hair and skin. Apply heat for optimum shine and condition.

reviews.headline: New Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I struggle with frizzy hair. I will use a small amount while my hair is damp, then a small amount when dry. It makes my hair SO soft and shiny. I get so many compliments! Not to mention it smells like candy! It's not heavy on my hair either. I belive I have low-medium porosity hair :)

reviews.headline: My favourite of all
reviews.comments:
Kenra  Hair Gloss is honestly one of the best—if not the best—hair gloss I've ever tried. My hair is very dry, and after I blow-dry it, it can look dull and lifeless with no shine at all. The moment I use this gloss, it completely transforms my hair—adding instant shine, softness, and smoothing everything so it looks sleek and healthy. The smell is amazing too! I love it so much that before my bottle even runs out, I make sure to buy another one so I'm never without it.

The only downside is that it's a little on the pricey side—but if you shop at Ulta, they always have coupons and rewards points you can use, which definitely helps make it more affordable. That's how I keep repurchasing this gem without breaking the bank.

reviews.headline: Nice Product
reviews.comments: This product makes my hair feel very soft when applying on damp hair, though I can't say it makes my 4a/b hair "shinier" like it claims. But the softness it provides makes a great base for styling.

reviews.headline: This is HOLY GRAIL!!!!
reviews.comments: Don't second guess buying this product!!! It works perfect for blow dry and right before the flat iron!!! My silk press came out amazing!I had been using CHI silk infusion for years, but never again. Kenra is my new go to!!!!

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!!!
reviews.comments: My hair is very wiry, thin, brittle, and prone to breakage. Left completely natural, it looks like worn out steel wool that has started to unravel, feels like very thin straw, and seems to shed more than my corgi in summer. When flat ironed without product, it kind of just lays flat with no movement. So naturally, I've decided to try and grow it out shoulder length. My reviews are based on how products have helped or hindered that effort, and may not be applicable to your hair type. For me, this product is a MUST HAVE!!! I use it as a finishing gloss after styling and makes my hair feel silky, healthy, and smooth; it adds texture and volume. This product is amazing!!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: It helps my hair not look fried

reviews.headline: I do not want to do without this product!
reviews.comments: I love this product. I calms my wavy hair down to blow dry. It smooths and shines! Buy now!

reviews.headline: Perfect scent and addition to our hair routine
reviews.comments: Great product to add if I am blowing out my curly hair or just to add to my curls after styling. The scent is amazing and I always look forward to having this product on my shelf. Kenra always has elevated products that are perfect for many hair types. Gives the perfect amount of silk and feel to the hair.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: My hair dresser turned me on to this product. It smells amazing. Like watermelon candy. It controls frizz without the greasy look or feel. You can reapply as much as you want. Which is then only downside. I noticed after a few hours, I had to reapply. Definitely a staple in my hair care routine. A little pricey but worth it.

reviews.headline: Definitely with the buy
reviews.comments: It works amazing, don't need alot to add some extra shine!

reviews.headline: Beautiful Shine
reviews.comments: This product makes my hair so shiny without looking greasy! Smells amazing!

reviews.headline: must have
reviews.comments: I love it

reviews.headline: One of my favorite products. SMELLS GREAT
reviews.comments:
I have been using this product for years . It smells like strawberries! Adds shine and softness. All you need is like 2 pumps . Can apply to wet or dry hair .
Can also be used on skin.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: My 4-C hair loves this oil when i gey a silk press. It doesn't weigh down my curls and gives my hair a nice shiny look.

reviews.headline: I loathed this product.
reviews.comments: I was extremely disappointed at this expensive product.  It dribbled out of the container and felt greay on my hands and in my hair. I;ve purchased hair glosses at a third of this cost that I liked SO much better!

reviews.headline: Great formula, bad packaging
reviews.comments: Love this hair gloss, it's like an oil/serum but it's mostly silicone tbh so its not greasy (which can be great for damaged hair as long as you're using clarifying hair cleansers). I like the smell and the texture, my hair is on the medium to thick side so it's not greasy or heavy looking on my hair and absorbs pretty well. More shine and silkiness, less tangles. My only gripe with this product is that the bottle leaks lkle a Mfr!!! Cannot travel with it anywhere, it leaks even passively somehow when sitting on my shelf and gets all over the bottle. Which is a shame for how much this product costs that the packaging is poor quality, and can't reliably contain the liquid gold they're selling inside of it.

reviews.headline: Great formula, bad packaging
reviews.comments: Love this hair gloss, it's like an oil/serum but it's mostly silicone tbh so its not greasy (which can be great for damaged hair as long as you're using clarifying hair cleansers). I like the smell and the texture, my hair is on the medium to thick side so it's not greasy or heavy looking on my hair and absorbs pretty well. More shine and silkiness, less tangles. My only gripe with this product is that the bottle leaks lkle a Mfr!!! Cannot travel with it anywhere, it leaks even passively somehow when sitting on my shelf and gets all over the bottle. Which is a shame for how much this product costs that the packaging is poor quality, and can't reliably contain the liquid gold they're selling inside of it.

reviews.headline: my review
reviews.comments: the price is a little expensive, but is it worth getting it? yess, let me tell u why, its smells and adds shine to ur hair and it makes ur hair look less dead. Doesnt makr ur hair look greasy at all ! would definitely recommend you getting this, you would not regret it!!

reviews.headline: my review
reviews.comments: the price is a little expensive, but is it worth getting it? yess, let me tell u why, its smells and adds shine to ur hair and it makes ur hair look less dead. Doesnt makr ur hair look greasy at all ! would definitely recommend you getting this, you would not regret it!!

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: This made my hair very shiny and smell good! Very easy to apply & use.

media.headline: Is it supposed to be reddish brown?
This is an awesome product and I LOVE the smell!!!

faceoff_positive.comments: Has 100% changed the way I feel about my hair. My hair is damaged from bleaching and then dying it dark. My natural texture is fine and straight but I have a lot of hair.  Only staying fresh for about 3 hours after a shower I was getting frustrated with the dull and tangled mess I was left with so I tried this product. (I had tried the silkening spray prior but it did not work the wonders that this gloss has.) For the first time in two years I love my hair. I apply the serum right after the shower on damp hair, comb it and let it air dry. In the morning I apply more of the gloss before using my straightener to create some bouncy waves and my hair stays shiny, soft, and smooth all day. Never did I think this would be achievable without some kind of chemical treatment. Try this if you are looking for shine, smoothness, silkiness and straight confidence in a bottle. Ps it even holds up in the rain, my hair usually becomes and instant frizzy mist but this saves it. SO HAPPY to have found this product. It's my one and only hair HOLY GRAIL product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Holy Grail

faceoff_negative.comments: First my review is based on the shipment problem.foolishly they taped down the outer cap which left stick residue down half of the bottle.the inner cap however was loose and looked liked it had been twisted open.deite the taoe,serum leaked everwhere. Secondly, the color I bought this twice before and needed another item for free ship so added this.it is tinted red, all my others were clear,what happened.never noticed it? Formula change? Look st the pic of my towel even after rubbed in,will this tint my o,bre ends? There were also flecks of red in it.i nor ally like this and I love the smell but afraid to use due to was it a return? Olld?
